comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: This gate is the entrance to the inner court of Tosho-gu. Tosho-gu was built in Nikko to enshrine the remains of Tokugawa Ieyasu, the founder of hte Tokugawa Shogunate. Located here. This photo is taken from the inside, an uncommon angle. NPL has another Kusakabe shot from outside NOW [http://www.flickr.com/photos/30097174@N00/80870217/]

comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: Hi, this photo has been discussed in one of the threads in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool!
